products.title: Sony XR65A80LU 65 Inch A80L 4K UHD HDR OLED Google Smart Bravia TV
products.body_html:
Sony XR65A80LU 65 Inch A80L 4K UHD HDR OLED Google Smart BRAVIA TV

Experience Picture Perfection with the Sony A80L 65 Inch BRAVIA XR OLED TV

For the ultimate in picture realism, the Sony A80L 65 Inch BRAVIA XR delivers unmatched performance, combining cutting-edge technology with a sleek design. Powered by Sony’s advanced Cognitive Processor XR, this OLED TV optimizes picture quality for incredible detail, vibrant colors, and lifelike contrast.

Sony’s Award-Winning OLED – Now Even Better

The Sony A80L 65 BRAVIA XR sets a new benchmark in home entertainment. Featuring a dedicated Game Menu and PS5-optimized settings, it’s the perfect companion for gamers. Pair it with the latest Google TV interface and BRAVIA CORE for access to over 700,000 movies, TV shows, and apps. With optional BRAVIA CAM support, you can enjoy immersive video calls, gesture controls, and picture brightness optimization.

OLED Technology Optimized with XR Picture Processing

With over eight million self-illuminating pixels, the Sony A80L 65 Inch OLED display provides deeper blacks, brighter highlights, and stunning contrast. Sony’s XR Picture Processing takes it even further, enhancing brightness and revealing intricate details in every scene.

Triluminos Pro and XR OLED Contrast Pro for Superior Color and Brightness

The Cognitive Processor XR powers the XR Triluminos Pro, which reproduces a vast range of natural, vivid colors. Combined with XR OLED Contrast Pro, this technology adjusts brightness to highlight finer details in darker scenes while delivering brighter peaks for maximum realism.

Smooth Motion and Blur-Free Action

Sony’s XR OLED Motion and XR Clear Image technology ensure smooth motion and reduced blur, perfect for fast-action sports or gaming. These features keep images crisp and fluid, making every viewing experience a visual treat.

Cinematic Viewing with Dolby Vision and IMAX Enhanced

Enjoy visuals exactly as creators intended, thanks to Dolby Vision, IMAX Enhanced, and Netflix Adaptive Calibrated Mode (NACM). The Sony A80L 65 Inch adjusts brightness based on ambient light, providing an optimal cinematic experience regardless of your room’s lighting.

Enhanced Gaming Features for PS5 Players

As a product from the creators of PlayStation, the Sony A80L 65 TV offers an unparalleled gaming experience. The new Game Menu provides easy access to settings, while features like Auto HDR Tone Mapping and Auto Genre Picture Mode automatically optimize the display for PS5 gaming or movie-watching.

Sound That Matches the Action

Sony’s Acoustic Surface Audio+ delivers sound directly from the screen, creating a perfect harmony between visuals and audio. For a more immersive sound experience, XR Surround and 360 Spatial Sound Personaliser elevate your viewing with Dolby Atmos and virtual surround effects.

Google TV for Smart Entertainment

With Google TV, the Sony A80L 65 Inch brings all your favorite content together in one place. Enjoy streaming services like Netflix, Disney+, YouTube, and Amazon Prime, with personalized recommendations and hands-free voice control via Google Assistant.

BRAVIA CORE – Premium Streaming Service

BRAVIA CORE takes streaming to the next level with 4K HDR content, IMAX Enhanced compatibility, and Pure Stream technology for unmatched clarity. With a streaming quality of up to 80Mbps, the Sony A80L ensures you enjoy cinematic visuals at their best.

Versatile 3-Way Stand for Flexible Installation

The Sony A80L features a 3-way stand for seamless integration into any space. Whether you need a narrow setup, space for a soundbar, or a standard low-profile position, this TV adapts effortlessly to your needs.

Elevate Your Viewing with the Sony A80L 65 Inch BRAVIA XR

Whether you're a gamer, movie enthusiast, or just someone who loves high-quality visuals, the Sony A80L 65 delivers an exceptional experience. Its XR OLED display, advanced gaming features, and cinematic sound make it the ultimate choice for your home entertainment system.

Transform your viewing experience today with the Sony A80L 65 Inch BRAVIA XR OLED Smart TV.

Display  

The Metz 55MRD6000 boasts DLED technology, delivering stunningly bright and crystal-clear images that will leave you in awe. With an impressive UHD resolution, you'll feel like you're part of the action on-screen. The Metz 55MRD6000 doesn't just provide exceptional picture quality, it's also built with your viewing comfort in mind. No matter where you sit in the room, everyone can enjoy an optimal viewing experience. Say goodbye to neck cramps and awkward angles, and say hello to a comfortable and enjoyable viewing experience with the Metz 55MRD6000.

Let's delve into the connectivity options of the Metz 55MRD6000. This smart TV offers a total of 3 HDMI ports and 2 USB ports, providing ample connectivity options for your devices. This TV truly has it all!  Additionally, the Metz 55MRD6000 comes equipped with Smart Connect, which makes it effortless to share photos or watch videos from your smartphone or tablet directly on the TV screen. Stay connected with the world and enjoy the convenience of effortless device connectivity with the Metz 55MRD6000.  

Design  

The Metz 55MRD6000 is not only an exceptional performer but also an aesthetically pleasing addition to any room. Its sleek black color effortlessly complements any decor style. Additionally, this TV is VESA mount compatible, which means you can easily mount it on your wall, freeing up valuable space in your home.  Weighing only 10 kg, it's effortless to move around and set up wherever you desire. Make a stylish statement with the Metz 55MRD6000, the perfect blend of style and performance.

products.body_html:
Sony KD65X75WLU 65 Inch X75WL LED 4K UHD HDR Google Smart BRAVIA TV

Premium Picture & Smart Features – Elevate Your Home Entertainment

Transform your viewing experience with the Sony BRAVIA KD-65X75WL, a 65-inch 4K UHD HDR Smart TV packed with cutting-edge technology for incredible visuals, dynamic sound, and seamless smart functionality.

Key Features of the Sony KD-65X75WLU

Processor X1™ for Stunning Picture Quality

At the core of the Sony BRAVIA KD-65X75WL is the powerful 4K Processor X1™, delivering real-time optimization for sharp clarity, lifelike color, and natural brightness. Experience Dolby Vision with unparalleled contrast and vibrant HDR visuals, along with support for HDR10 and HLG formats for compatibility with top-tier streaming services, games, and movies.

Silky Smooth Action with Motionflow™ XR

Say goodbye to blur and hello to fluid motion with Motionflow™ XR. Perfect for sports, action-packed movies, and gaming, this technology ensures smooth transitions without compromising the cinematic realism of your favorite content.

X-Balanced Speakers with Dolby Atmos®

Immerse yourself in rich, clear audio with Sony’s innovative X-Balanced speakers, delivering enhanced clarity for music and speech. For a true cinematic experience, this TV supports Dolby Atmos®, filling your room with multidimensional sound.

Designed for Gamers – Optimized for PlayStation® 5

Get ready for a superior gaming experience with Auto HDR Tone Mapping and Auto Genre Picture Mode, perfect for your PlayStation® 5. The new Gaming Menu gives quick access to essential game settings, making this TV a must-have for next-level gaming.

Google TV – All Your Entertainment, All in One Place

Enjoy effortless access to over 700,000 movies and TV episodes, along with 10,000+ apps and games via Google TV. With built-in Google Assistant, search and control your TV hands-free, or integrate with Amazon Alexa, Apple AirPlay, and HomeKit for ultimate convenience.

BRAVIA CORE™ – Premium Streaming Service

Stream hundreds of movies in stunning 4K HDR with BRAVIA CORE™, Sony’s exclusive streaming service. Enjoy high-bitrate streaming up to 80Mbps for crystal-clear quality, and immerse yourself in IMAX Enhanced movies for unparalleled cinematic sound and visuals.

Family-Friendly with BRAVIA CAM (Optional)

Enhance your experience with the optional BRAVIA CAM. Features include:

  • Proximity Alerts to ensure safe viewing distances for children.
  • Gesture Control for effortless, remote-free operation.
  • Seamless video calls for connecting with loved ones on the big screen.

Adjustable Stand for Flexible Placement

The Sony KD-65X75WL comes with a 2-position adjustable stand, allowing you to adapt the TV’s setup to your furniture. Choose a wide stance for stability or a narrow stance for smaller spaces.

Why Choose the Sony BRAVIA KD-65X75WL?

  • Superior Picture: Experience breathtaking 4K visuals with the 4K Processor X1™ and Dolby Vision.
  • Immersive Sound: X-Balanced speakers and Dolby Atmos® deliver theater-quality audio.
  • Smart Convenience: Google TV, hands-free voice control, and BRAVIA CORE™ make it smarter than ever.
  • Gaming-Ready: Perfect for PS5 with advanced gaming features.
  • Sleek Design: Slim, stylish, and versatile with an adjustable stand.

Final Note

Bring your entertainment to life with the Sony KD-65X75WLU 65 Inch X75WL LED 4K UHD HDR Google Smart BRAVIA TV. Whether it’s family movie nights, intense gaming sessions, or binge-watching your favorite series, this TV delivers an unparalleled experience.

FAQs and Important Notes:

  1. App Availability: Third-party apps may be subject to change or withdrawal by providers.
  2. Catch-Up TV: Freeview Play catch-up service is not supported on this model.

Upgrade your home entertainment with the power of Sony’s innovative technology. Order your Sony KD-65X75WLU today!

products.title: Sony XR98X90LU 98 Inch X90L 4K UHD HDR Full Array LED Google Smart Bravia TV
products.body_html:
Sony XR98X90LU 98 Inch X90L 4K UHD HDR Full Array LED Google Smart BRAVIA TV

Great for sports, with bright, vivid scenes. This is the Sony BRAVIA X90L Full Array LED TV.   Our Cognitive Processor XR understands how humans see and hear in real-life. For example, it recognises that you will be focusing on the player with the ball, and that the sound of the crowd should roar from all directions. Scenes are then recreated in your living room that are so realistic, you can see them unfold in front of your eyes and hear the action all around you.   

Full Array LED breathes brightness and contrast into every competition. No more details overwhelmed by shadow or lost in blown-out highlights - just breath-taking contrast, colour, and depth - even when watching in daylight!   High-speed sports are smooth, clear, and blur-free, thanks to our XR Motion Clarity technology.   Our Acoustic Multi Audio technology recreates sound that appears to come from its original sound source, so you'll hear as a car races across the horizon or the sound of a cheering crowd from the sides, and feel closer to the atmosphere inside the stadium.   You can even take your set-up to the next level with the Acoustic Center Sync feature and a compatible Sony soundbar.   

The smooth, aluminium Seamless Edge Bezel will harmonise with any interior while the 3-way aluminium wedge TV stand will offer ultimate convenience.   Hundreds of movies are waiting for you on the BRAVIA CORE app! Exclusively for BRAVIA XR owners, you'll gain access to the Sony Pictures Entertainment library filled with the latest blockbusters and classics, watch in Pure Stream (the highest in streaming quality), enjoy the largest available collection of IMAX Enhanced movies, and be treated to behind-the-scenes Studio Access. Choose 10 movies to redeem in up to 4K HDR quality, and enjoy 24 months of unlimited streaming.   

Our new dedicated Gaming Menu allows you to optimise your gaming performance - quickly. It includes Motion Blur Reduction, Black Equaliser, Crosshair (available in six different styles), and Custom Screen, which allows you to maximise your view when you need to see more detail in every corner of a game and minimise it when you need your eyes to focus on the enemy with laser vision!   You'll access 700,000+ movies and TV episodes from across your streaming services on this Google TV, and everything is organised into topics and genres to suit your personal interests.   You can even save up to 32% more energy with our TV! Our new Eco Dashboard puts all of your eco settings in one place that's intuitive and user-friendly, so you can save energy without hassle or jargon.*   BRAVIA CAM is compatible, inviting you to enjoy video chats on the big screen, and more.   

Crunchyroll - the largest anime streaming service in the world – is included on the X90L too. With a vast library of anime, manga, and other original content, movies and shows are translated and subtitled or dubbed, so you can enjoy in a variety of languages.

products.body_html:
Sony XR55X90LU 55 Inch X90L 4K UHD HDR Full Array LED Google Smart Bravia TV

Looking for a high-performance 55-inch TV that combines breathtaking picture quality, advanced smart features, and superior audio? The Sony BRAVIA XR55X90LU is a standout option. Praised by What Hi-Fi? with a 5-star review for its “cinematic and consistently outstanding results,” this TV offers cutting-edge technology to transform your entertainment experience.

A Premium 55-Inch 4K TV with Advanced Tech

The Sony BRAVIA XR55X90LU may be the smallest in the X90L lineup, but it delivers the same groundbreaking features as the larger models. Thanks to its Full Array LED panel with advanced local dimming, it achieves unparalleled contrast, color depth, and realism. With enhanced gaming capabilities, Google TV integration, and cinematic audio, this TV excels across the board.

Unmatched Picture Quality with Full Array LED and Local Dimming

Featuring a Full Array LED panel, the XR55X90LU improves picture contrast by precisely controlling brightness across multiple zones. Its upgraded local dimming technology enhances shadow detail and depth, ensuring vivid, lifelike visuals perfect for movies, sports, and gaming.

Rich, Vibrant Colors with XR Triluminos Pro

Powered by the Cognitive Processor XR, this Sony TV boasts XR Triluminos Pro technology, delivering extended color volume for ultra-realistic hues. From lush nature scenes to fast-paced action, every frame bursts with rich, vibrant color.

Smooth Motion and Crisp Clarity

Sony's XR Motion Clarity minimizes blur and enhances sharpness for fast-moving content like sports and gaming. Combined with XR Clear Image, every pixel is kept in check, offering you smooth and highly detailed visuals, even during rapid action sequences.

Cinematic Precision – IMAX Enhanced, Dolby Vision, and Calman Ready

This TV replicates content as creators intended with IMAX Enhanced and Dolby Vision support, providing a cinematic viewing experience at home. It’s also Calman Ready, ideal for professional-grade calibration, and features Netflix Adaptive Calibrated Mode (NACM), which adjusts picture settings based on your room’s lighting for optimal results.

Innovative BRAVIA CAM Compatibility

Pair your TV with the optional BRAVIA CAM for a personalized viewing experience. This camera adjusts sound and brightness based on your seating position and lighting conditions. It also supports gesture controls and video calls, adding a new layer of functionality.

Acoustic Multi-Audio for Immersive Sound

Sony's Acoustic Multi-Audio system ensures sound aligns perfectly with on-screen action, creating a seamless connection between visuals and audio. Upgrade further with XR Surround for virtual 3D surround sound or pair with Sony’s SRS-NS7 wearable speaker for Dolby Atmos immersion.

Perfect for Gaming – Optimized for PS5

Designed with gamers in mind, this TV includes Auto HDR Tone Mapping and Auto Genre Picture Mode, making it the ultimate screen for your PS5. A dedicated Gaming Menu lets you access settings and assist features effortlessly, ensuring smooth gameplay.

Google TV – Smart Entertainment Simplified

With Google TV, you can easily access 700,000+ movies, shows, and 10,000+ apps, including Netflix, Disney+, and YouTube. Built-in Google Assistant and compatibility with Apple AirPlay, HomeKit, and Amazon Alexa ensure seamless voice control and connectivity across platforms.

Exclusive BRAVIA CORE Streaming

The BRAVIA CORE service lets you stream movies in up to 4K HDR with a bitrate that rivals physical Blu-ray discs. Featuring IMAX Enhanced titles and hundreds of films, it’s a premium streaming experience designed for movie lovers.

Customizable 2-Way Stand

The included 2-way stand offers flexible setup options, whether you prefer a standard low-profile placement or need clearance for a soundbar.

Why Choose the Sony XR55X90LU?

  • Stunning 4K UHD Picture Quality: Full Array LED with local dimming and XR Triluminos Pro.

  • Smart TV Excellence: Google TV with built-in voice control and endless entertainment options.

Discover the ultimate viewing experience with the Sony BRAVIA XR55X90LU 55 Inch X90L 4K UHD HDR Full Array LED Google Smart TV. Whether you're watching blockbuster movies, gaming on your PS5, or streaming your favorite shows, this TV guarantees unparalleled performance.

products.title: Sony XR50X90SU X90S BRAVIA XR Full Array LED 4K UHD HDR Smart Google TV 2022
products.body_html:
Sony XR50X90SU X90S BRAVIA XR Full Array LED 4K Ultra HD High Dynamic Range HDR Smart TV Google TV 2022

Next generation picture and sound with Cognitive Intelligence

Take vision and sound to the next level with Cognitive Processor XR™. Our revolutionary processor on Sony BRAVIA XR™ TVs reproduces content the way humans see and hear for an incredibly lifelike experience. It understands how the human eye focuses, cross analysing images to give real life depth, extraordinary contrast and beautifully vivid colours.

A wide colour spectrum for real-world shades and hues

Powered by our Cognitive Processor XR™, XR Triluminos Pro enables X90S to access over a billion colours and reproduce each one with the subtle differences seen in the real world. Together with our wide colour gamut panel and human-centric processor, it can detect colour from saturation, hue and brightness to deliver natural shades in every detail.

Enjoy more depth with deep blacks and extra brightness

Our Cognitive Processor XR™ enhances pictures in the same way as your eyes focus for real life colour and depth. By precisely balancing light output across the screen, dimming some areas and boosting others, XR Contrast Booster adjusts brightness for higher peaks in glare and deeper blacks in shadow. Scenes look more real with extra depth and detail.

Recreating lost texture, all your content upscaled to 4K

With XR 4K Upscaling, you'll enjoy entertainment close to 4K quality, whatever the content or source. Our Cognitive Processor XR™ accesses a vast amount of data, intelligently recreating lost textures and detail for real world pictures.

Intelligent motion processing for fast-moving, blur-free scenes

Watching sports and fast-moving movies just got a whole lot better. Our Cognitive Processor XR™ with XR Motion Clarity™ analyses motion across several frames to ensure action stays smooth, bright and clear.

Sound from the screen, matches pictures precisely

Our Acoustic Multi-Audio™ technology includes sound positioning tweeters to ensure high frequency sounds come from the right place in the scene. The sound positioning tweeters on this BRAVIA XR Full Array LED TV match sound precisely with what’s on screen for a truly immersive experience.

All your entertainment upscaled to 3D surround sound

With BRAVIA XR™, everything you watch gets the true surround sound treatment. XR Surround virtually creates surround sound from the sides and vertically using just the TV speakers, so you can experience 3D audio without the need for in-ceiling or up-firing speakers. Our BRAVIA XR™ TVs are also compatible with Dolby Atmos®.

Best with Sony audio

Paired with Sony audio equipment, our latest BRAVIA XR TVs go even further, bringing you an unmatched audio-visual experience with outstanding XR picture and sound quality.

Ready for 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer

Tailor your Dolby Atmos® experience by combining our SRS-NS7 wearable speaker with BRAVIA XR™ for spatial surround sound. With selected Sony headphones, you can also enjoy the simulated surround of 360 Spatial Sound using Wireless Transmitter WLA-NS7 (sold separately).

Voice Zoom™ 2 enhances voices for clearer dialogue

Hear TV dialogue more clearly without turning up the volume. Even if speech is difficult to hear, Voice Zoom 2 detects the type of voice, analyses it and enhances its clarity.

products.title: Sony XR48A90KU A90K BRAVIA XR MASTER Series OLED 4K Ultra HD High Dynamic Range HDR Smart TV Google TV
products.body_html:
Sony XR48A90KU A90K BRAVIA XR MASTER Series OLED 4K Ultra HD High Dynamic Range HDR Smart TV Google TV 2022

4K OLED
Whatever you're watching, you'll see it upscaled close to 4K quality thanks to our unique Cognitive Processor XR™. You'll also enjoy striking contrast on our OLED screen that's expertly controlled by our unique technology to deliver real life depth and pure blacks in every scene.

Cognitive Processor XR™
Take vision and sound to the next level with Cognitive Processor XR™. Our revolutionary processor on Sony BRAVIA XR™ TVs reproduces content the way humans see and hear for an incredibly lifelike experience. It understands how the human eye focuses, cross analysing images to give real life depth, extraordinary contrast and beautifully vivid colours.

XR OLED Contrast Pro
XR OLED Contrast Pro boosts colour and contrast in bright areas for exceptionally realistic pictures defined by absolute pure blacks and peak brightness. With a temperature sensor [1] and high luminance panel [2], this OLED TV utilises our Cognitive Processor XR™ to detect screen temperature and precisely control light so pixels in bright areas are illuminated simultaneously.

XR Triluminos Pro
Powered by our Cognitive Processor XR™, XR Triluminos Pro enables A90K to access over a billion colours and reproduce each one with the subtle differences seen in the real world. Together with our wide colour gamut panel and human-centric processor, it can detect colour from saturation, hue and brightness to deliver natural shades in every detail.

XR HDR Remaster
With XR HDR Remaster, this TV can detect each object on screen, analyse its colour and adjust contrast for even more realistic pictures. Object-based processing, powered by BRAVIA XR, takes precision to a whole new level by adding adjustment of hue, saturation, brightness, motion vector, bandwidth and more. The result is exceptionally real scenes with greater depth, lifelike textures and natural colours.

XR 4K Upscaling
With XR 4K Upscaling, you'll enjoy entertainment close to 4K quality, whatever the content or source. Our Cognitive Processor XR™ accesses a vast amount of data, intelligently recreating lost textures and detail for real world pictures.

4K XR Super Resolution
XR Super Resolution detects individual objects in a picture and reproduces virtually real world textures on screen. Our BRAVIA XR processor precisely analyses and processes data to power 4K pictures with four times the resolution of Full HD to enrich scenes with real world detail and texture.

4K XR Smoothing
XR Smoothing creates smooth, natural 4K pictures as you watch, without the “banding” that can occur on other TVs. Scenes are reproduced with thousands of tones, shades and gradations, making them look incredibly real.

XR OLED Motion
Powered by our Cognitive Processor XR™, XR OLED Motion combats blur by detecting and cross analysing key visual elements on successive frames. It creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones so you can enjoy smooth and clear action, even in fast-moving sequences.

Beautiful colours from any angle
Watching TV from the sides is now as satisfying as from the centre. Our self-illuminating OLED panel keeps colours consistent and true, wherever you're watching.

4K/120fps
Get the edge on the competition with BRAVIA. With HDMI 2.1, you can get an up to 120fps framerate on compatible games, so you can take on any challenge in shooting, sports and high-performance games with near instant on-screen action. You'll also enjoy ultra-smooth gaming with reduced input lag of 8.5ms with 4K/120fps and dedicated Game Mode.

Auto Low Latency Mode
With Auto Low Latency Mode in HDMI 2.1, BRAVIA recognises when a console is connected and powered on, and automatically switches to low latency mode. You'll enjoy smoother, more responsive gameplay – vital for fast-moving, high-intensity games.

Variable Refresh Rate
With a Variable Refresh Rate in HDMI 2.1, BRAVIA avoids stuttering delays and screen tearing. This TV dynamically adjusts the display refresh rate to match the variable frame rates of the gaming device for smoother gameplay.

Auto HDR Tone Mapping
With Auto HDR Tone Mapping the HDR settings will be optimised instantly during your PS5™ console’s initial setup. Your PS5™ automatically recognises individual BRAVIA TV models and selects the best HDR setting for your TV accordingly. So even in high contrast scenes, you’ll see the crucial details and colours in the brightest and darkest parts of the screen.

Auto Genre Picture Mode
BRAVIA automatically switches into Game mode to minimise input lag and make the action more responsive. When watching movies on PlayStation5® consoles, it switches back to Standard Mode to focus on picture processing for more expressive scenes.

Acoustic Surface Audio+
Sound comes directly from the screen with Acoustic Surface Audio＋™. Two actuators vibrate, uniquely turning the entire screen into a speaker to create powerful acoustics that move with the picture so you hear realistic sounds with clear and natural dialogue. A centre subwoofer boosts bass for truly immersive cinematic sound at home.

3D Surround Upscaling
With BRAVIA XR™, everything you watch gets the true surround sound treatment. XR Surround virtually creates surround sound from the sides and vertically using just the TV speakers, so you can experience 3D audio without the need for in-ceiling or up-firing speakers. Our BRAVIA XR™ TVs are also compatible with Dolby Atmos®.

Voice Zoom 2
Hear TV dialogue more clearly without turning up the volume. Even if speech is difficult to hear, Voice Zoom 2 detects the type of voice, analyses it and enhances its clarity.

Acoustic Center Sync
When you connect a BRAVIA XR TV to a Sony soundbar, the soundbar reinforces the centre speaker channel for clearer and fuller vocals. This enables sound to precisely match on-screen action for a truly immersive experience.

Ready for 360 Spatial Sound
Tailor your Dolby Atmos® experience by combining our SRS-NS7 wearable speaker with BRAVIA XR™ for spatial surround sound. With selected Sony headphones, you can also enjoy the simulated surround of 360 Spatial Sound using Wireless Transmitter WLA-NS7 (sold separately).

Bluetooth connectivity
Connect Bluetooth® compatible devices to your TV for easy wire free entertainment. Pair your Bluetooth headphones or earphones with BRAVIA and enjoy TV shows and music in your favourite place - without any disturbances or interruptions.

Ambient Optimization
Sit back and enjoy an enthralling viewing experience. Our unique ambient optimisation technology with light sensor automatically adjusts picture and sound to your environment.

Light Sensor
On conventional TVs, brightness stays the same regardless of light in a room, resulting in pictures that are too dark or bright. This TV includes a light sensor that optimises picture brightness to room conditions, boosting brightness in light rooms and reducing it in dark ones so you get the perfect view.

Acoustic Auto Calibration
No matter where you're sitting, this TV detects your position and optimises sound so you'll enjoy the same sound quality as if you're sitting right in front of the TV. Sound can change depending on your room environment. Curtains, for example, absorb sound while objects in front of the TV can disturb the passage of sound, compromising the quality of what you hear. This TV detects objects and reproduces sound that’s enhanced and optimised to your room.

Works with BRAVIA CAM
Connect your BRAVIA XR TV with BRAVIA CAM, sold separately, for an even more immersive viewing experience. BRAVIA CAM recognises where you are in the room and how far you are from the TV, then adjusts sound and picture settings so they're just right. You can also enjoy an array of fun new TV experiences with BRAVIA CAM including gesture controls, video chat and many more.

Google TV
Browse 700,000+ movies and TV episodes from across your streaming services, all in one place and organised into topics and genres based on what interests you.

Hands-free Voice Search

Find your favourite content faster than ever using the power of your voice, no remote required. With Voice Search, there’s no more complicated navigation or tiresome typing – you just have to ask.

Google Assistant
Your TV is more helpful than ever. Use your voice to find movies, stream apps, play music, and control the TV. Ask Google to find a specific title, search by genre, or get personalised recommendations by saying, “what should I watch?” Even get answers like sports scores, control smart home devices, and more. Talk to Google to get started.

Works with Alexa
Connect your Alexa enabled devices for seamless hands-free control of a Sony TV. With Alexa, you can power up your TV, change channels, control volume and more.

Works with Ok Google
Watch your favourite movies and shows without hunting down the remote. Now you can just use your voice to control your Sony TV through a Google Assistant-enabled device. Just say “Ok Google” to get started.

Works with Apple AirPlay / Apple HomeKit
With Apple AirPlay, you can stream video and audio to your television right from your iPhone, iPad, or Mac. Watch movies and shows from the Apple TV app, your favourite apps, or even Safari. Share your photos with everyone in the room.

Chromecast built-in

products.title: Sony XR42A90KU A90K BRAVIA XR MASTER Series OLED 4K Ultra HD High Dynamic Range HDR Smart TV Google TV
products.body_html:
Sony XR42A90KU A90K BRAVIA XR MASTER Series OLED 4K Ultra HD HDR Smart Google TV 2022

4K OLED
Whatever you're watching, you'll see it upscaled close to 4K quality thanks to our unique Cognitive Processor XR™. You'll also enjoy striking contrast on our OLED screen that's expertly controlled by our unique technology to deliver real life depth and pure blacks in every scene.

Cognitive Processor XR™
Take vision and sound to the next level with Cognitive Processor XR™. Our revolutionary processor on Sony BRAVIA XR™ TVs reproduces content the way humans see and hear for an incredibly lifelike experience. It understands how the human eye focuses, cross analysing images to give real life depth, extraordinary contrast and beautifully vivid colours.

XR OLED Contrast Pro
XR OLED Contrast Pro boosts colour and contrast in bright areas for exceptionally realistic pictures defined by absolute pure blacks and peak brightness. With a temperature sensor [1] and high luminance panel [2], this OLED TV utilises our Cognitive Processor XR™ to detect screen temperature and precisely control light so pixels in bright areas are illuminated simultaneously.

XR Triluminos Pro
Powered by our Cognitive Processor XR™, XR Triluminos Pro enables A90K to access over a billion colours and reproduce each one with the subtle differences seen in the real world. Together with our wide colour gamut panel and human-centric processor, it can detect colour from saturation, hue and brightness to deliver natural shades in every detail.

XR HDR Remaster
With XR HDR Remaster, this TV can detect each object on screen, analyse its colour and adjust contrast for even more realistic pictures. Object-based processing, powered by BRAVIA XR, takes precision to a whole new level by adding adjustment of hue, saturation, brightness, motion vector, bandwidth and more. The result is exceptionally real scenes with greater depth, lifelike textures and natural colours.

XR 4K Upscaling
With XR 4K Upscaling, you'll enjoy entertainment close to 4K quality, whatever the content or source. Our Cognitive Processor XR™ accesses a vast amount of data, intelligently recreating lost textures and detail for real world pictures.

4K XR Super Resolution
XR Super Resolution detects individual objects in a picture and reproduces virtually real world textures on screen. Our BRAVIA XR processor precisely analyses and processes data to power 4K pictures with four times the resolution of Full HD to enrich scenes with real world detail and texture.

4K XR Smoothing
XR Smoothing creates smooth, natural 4K pictures as you watch, without the “banding” that can occur on other TVs. Scenes are reproduced with thousands of tones, shades and gradations, making them look incredibly real.

XR OLED Motion
Powered by our Cognitive Processor XR™, XR OLED Motion combats blur by detecting and cross analysing key visual elements on successive frames. It creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones so you can enjoy smooth and clear action, even in fast-moving sequences.

Beautiful colours from any angle
Watching TV from the sides is now as satisfying as from the centre. Our self-illuminating OLED panel keeps colours consistent and true, wherever you're watching.

4K/120fps
Get the edge on the competition with BRAVIA. With HDMI 2.1, you can get an up to 120fps framerate on compatible games, so you can take on any challenge in shooting, sports and high-performance games with near instant on-screen action. You'll also enjoy ultra-smooth gaming with reduced input lag of 8.5ms with 4K/120fps and dedicated Game Mode.

Auto Low Latency Mode
With Auto Low Latency Mode in HDMI 2.1, BRAVIA recognises when a console is connected and powered on, and automatically switches to low latency mode. You'll enjoy smoother, more responsive gameplay – vital for fast-moving, high-intensity games.

Variable Refresh Rate
With a Variable Refresh Rate in HDMI 2.1, BRAVIA avoids stuttering delays and screen tearing. This TV dynamically adjusts the display refresh rate to match the variable frame rates of the gaming device for smoother gameplay.

Auto HDR Tone Mapping
With Auto HDR Tone Mapping the HDR settings will be optimised instantly during your PS5™ console’s initial setup. Your PS5™ automatically recognises individual BRAVIA TV models and selects the best HDR setting for your TV accordingly. So even in high contrast scenes, you’ll see the crucial details and colours in the brightest and darkest parts of the screen.

Auto Genre Picture Mode
BRAVIA automatically switches into Game mode to minimise input lag and make the action more responsive. When watching movies on PlayStation5® consoles, it switches back to Standard Mode to focus on picture processing for more expressive scenes.

Acoustic Surface Audio+
Sound comes directly from the screen with Acoustic Surface Audio＋™. Two actuators vibrate, uniquely turning the entire screen into a speaker to create powerful acoustics that move with the picture so you hear realistic sounds with clear and natural dialogue. A centre subwoofer boosts bass for truly immersive cinematic sound at home.

3D Surround Upscaling
With BRAVIA XR™, everything you watch gets the true surround sound treatment. XR Surround virtually creates surround sound from the sides and vertically using just the TV speakers, so you can experience 3D audio without the need for in-ceiling or up-firing speakers. Our BRAVIA XR™ TVs are also compatible with Dolby Atmos®.

Voice Zoom 2
Hear TV dialogue more clearly without turning up the volume. Even if speech is difficult to hear, Voice Zoom 2 detects the type of voice, analyses it and enhances its clarity.

Acoustic Center Sync
When you connect a BRAVIA XR TV to a Sony soundbar, the soundbar reinforces the centre speaker channel for clearer and fuller vocals. This enables sound to precisely match on-screen action for a truly immersive experience.

Ready for 360 Spatial Sound
Tailor your Dolby Atmos® experience by combining our SRS-NS7 wearable speaker with BRAVIA XR™ for spatial surround sound. With selected Sony headphones, you can also enjoy the simulated surround of 360 Spatial Sound using Wireless Transmitter WLA-NS7 (sold separately).

Bluetooth connectivity
Connect Bluetooth® compatible devices to your TV for easy wire free entertainment. Pair your Bluetooth headphones or earphones with BRAVIA and enjoy TV shows and music in your favourite place - without any disturbances or interruptions.

Ambient Optimization
Sit back and enjoy an enthralling viewing experience. Our unique ambient optimisation technology with light sensor automatically adjusts picture and sound to your environment.

Light Sensor
On conventional TVs, brightness stays the same regardless of light in a room, resulting in pictures that are too dark or bright. This TV includes a light sensor that optimises picture brightness to room conditions, boosting brightness in light rooms and reducing it in dark ones so you get the perfect view.

Acoustic Auto Calibration
No matter where you're sitting, this TV detects your position and optimises sound so you'll enjoy the same sound quality as if you're sitting right in front of the TV. Sound can change depending on your room environment. Curtains, for example, absorb sound while objects in front of the TV can disturb the passage of sound, compromising the quality of what you hear. This TV detects objects and reproduces sound that’s enhanced and optimised to your room.

Works with BRAVIA CAM
Connect your BRAVIA XR TV with BRAVIA CAM, sold separately, for an even more immersive viewing experience. BRAVIA CAM recognises where you are in the room and how far you are from the TV, then adjusts sound and picture settings so they're just right. You can also enjoy an array of fun new TV experiences with BRAVIA CAM including gesture controls, video chat and many more.
